active.name: Vigilance
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to the current location of your ally and upon completion grant both yourself and the ally a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 100% of your AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of your '''bonus''' health)}} damage for 5 seconds. '''Can be used even while the ally is dead.'''

effects_structured.raw: {{tip|Dash}} to the current location of your ally and upon completion grant both yourself and the ally a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 100% of your AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of your '''bonus''' health)}} damage for 5 seconds. '''Can be used even while the ally is dead.'''
